title: Jeb:将迁移皮肤数据(无大影响)
author: a20001017
txt_content:
本帖最后由 a20001017 于 2014-1-14 21:37 编辑 

Jeb:Next week we'll migrate the skin and cape database to a new system. This will make skin uploading unavailable for a while. More info soon!Jeb:Why are you asking if it affects MCPE? Since when did you have skin uploading on MCPE? ;D
Jeb:On that topic, we're aiming to introduce skins on MCPE in the 0.9.0 update
Jeb:Posted about the skin database migration in the Minecraft launcher blog: http://mcupdate.tumblr.com/




Jeb:下一周我们会迁移皮肤和披风的数据库。这会让皮肤上传在一段时间中不可用。等会再和你们详细谈。
Jeb:为什么你们问我会不会影响MCPE？从古至今你们难道在MCPE上用过皮肤吗？  ;D
Jeb:接着刚才的话题，但是我们正致力于在MCPE0.9.0中引进皮肤系统。
Jeb:在Minecraft启动器博客中发了个关于迁移皮肤数据库的帖子：http://mcupdate.tumblr.com/


搬家啦，在番茄台的新闻里这个时候应该放烟火~~
